text: RNA isolation , cDNA synthesis and qPCR
Total RNA was extracted using Aurum Total RNA mini kit ( BioRad ) and reverse transcribed into cDNA with iScript cDNA synthesis kit ( BioRad ) according to the manufacturer 's instructions .

qPCR was performed by using SYBR Green I master mix I ( Roche ) in the Lightcycler 480 detection system ( Roche ) with the following primers : HPRT : 5'-AGTGTTGGATACAGGCCAGAC-3 ' and 5'CGTGATTCAAATCCCTGAAGT-3 ' ; <extra_id_0> IL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> : 5'-GAGGATACCACTCCCAACAGACC-3 ' and 5'-AAGTGCATCATCGTTGTTCATACA-3 ' ; <extra_id_0> IFNbeta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> : 5'-TCAGAATGAGTGGTGGTTGC-3 ' and 5'-GACCTTTCAAATGCAGTAGATTCA-3 ' ; <extra_id_0> A20 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> : 5'-AAACCAATGGTGATGGAAACTG-3 ' and 5'-GTTGTCCCATTCGTCATTCC-3 ' ; <extra_id_0> CCL2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> : 5'-TTAAAAACCTGGATCGGAACCAA-3 ' and 5'-GCATTAGCTTCAGATTTACGGGT-3 ' ; <extra_id_0> CXCL1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> : 5'-GAGCCTCTAACCAGTTCCAG-3 ' and 5'-TGAGTGTGGCTATGACTTCG-3 ' and <extra_id_0> IFNalpha4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> : 5'-TGATGAGCTACTACTGGTCAGC-3 ' and 5'-GATCTCTTAGCACAAGGATGGC-3 ' .
Primers were designed with PerlPrimer ( http : / / perlprimer.sourceforge.net ) .
Quantification was performed using the comparative CT method ( deltadeltaCT ) .
Results are expressed relative to HPRT values .
